thread.title: Facebook Launches TechPrep Hub to Help Grow STEM Diversity Pipeline
thread.title_full: Facebook Launches TechPrep Hub to Help Grow STEM Diversity Pipeline

title: Facebook Launches TechPrep Hub to Help Grow STEM Diversity Pipeline
text:
Facebook Launches TechPrep, Hub to Help Grow STEM Diversity Pipeline 
Latin Post Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Facebook's TechPrep hopes to boost diversity in technology by empowering underrepresented minority students and their parents to get involved in computer science. On Tuesday, Facebook announced it was launching a new initiative called TechPrep. It's an effort to boost diversity in Silicon Valley by providing underrepresented students and their parents the resources to get a head start on a career in STEM (science, technology, engineering and mathematics). 
The initiative is a partnership between the social media giant and consulting firm McKinsey and Company....
